about_the_game:
SUMMARY:

Inn Hand places you in the role of a deity bound to the most modest of realms, transforming your mouse cursor into a spectral hand that presides over an isometric inn.

Tend to weary adventurers who come seeking rest, refreshing brews, and agreeable company. Keep tabs on your fickle patrons' debts as they exchange coin for your unmatched service and hospitality. Collect what you're owed to ensure your inn thrives, but be mindful: within these walls, reputation is as potent as the brew you serve...

FEATURES:

  • Relaxed, Cozy Atmosphere: Immerse yourself in a cozy isometric inn featuring nearly two hours of atmospheric music.

  • Helping Hand: Replace your mouse cursor with an ethereal hand to manipulate patrons and manage your inn. Just try not to drop anyone, or they may leave a bad review.

  • Picky Patrons: Each patron has a distinct class, and not all classes get along. Strategize seating preferences to avoid upsetting your patrons and keep the reviews glowing!

  • Balance Brews: Each class craves specific drinks, and maintaining your inventory is key to maximizing profit before the once-daily restock. Seat your patrons wisely to ensure an even flow of orders so you don’t end up with too much of one brew and no one to drink it.

  • Rest and Recharge: When your patrons grow tired, tuck them into bed to free up seats for paying customers. But stay vigilant—only you can protect them from the monsters lurking under the bed.

  • Tracking Tabs: Keep an eye on each patron’s spending. Once they've racked up a large tab or run out of gold, it’s time to send them into the void and collect their debt. Just be careful not to disturb their drinking or sleeping, as you'll lose any "pending" tab!

  • Improve Your Inn: Expand your inn with larger tables and improved seating to attract wealthier adventurers and watch your coffers fill with gold. Tables can also be rearranged while the inn is closed and empty of all patrons.

  • Endless Entertainment: Let time melt away with infinite gameplay! Don’t fret if you come up short on rent—you’ll simply be bumped back to a previous tier, allowing you to keep playing at your own pace.

Inn Hand is an indie passion project created by a single developer.

content_descriptors.notes: Cartoon violence, crude humor, depictions of alcoholic beverages and their consumption.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 3.0
  • Processor: Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan or OpenGL 4.3 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS 3.0
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan or OpenGL 4.3 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Inn Hand is an atmospheric god game and casual management sim that places you in the role of a magical deity operating a cozy isometric inn. Replace your mouse cursor with a spectral hand to tend to your patrons' needs in exchange for gold and reviews, ensuring your inn thrives!
